means: 充满危险地，危机四伏地

sentence.Network_en: We climbed rather perilously down a rope-ladder to the boat below.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们冒着相当大的危险沿着绳梯爬到了下面的船上。
这条小道蜿蜒而上，很危险。

sentence.Network_en: They were perilously close to the edge of the precipice.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们离悬崖边很近,十分危险.

Urban unemployment would rise perilously ., 城市的失业率上升到警戒水平.
译言网 | 逃离“铁锈城市” ... swath n. 收割的宽度 perilously adv. 危及四伏 metro n. 大都会.

list.abs: "perilous"怎么说合适-翻译"perilous"-可可查词 ... perilous situation 惊涛骇浪; perilous peak 险峰; perilous peaks 险峰.
顺便的英文翻译 ... in peace 安祥地 in peril 冒着危险 in peril of 有...的危险使...发生危险.
通常国际贸易用语 - Alex tang的日志 - 网易博客 ... manager 经理 maritime perils 海上危险 maturity 汇票到期日.

entry.def: Something that is perilous is very dangerous.

example.tran: 横穿交战区的危险之旅

example.ex: The road grew even steeper and more perilous.
example.tran: 道路变得越来越陡峭，越来越凶险。

sentences.sentence: "he came dangerously close to falling off the ledge"

auth_sentence.content: That submarine permafrost is perilously close to thawing.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: That submarine permafrost is perilously close to thawing.

auth_sentence.content: In one night, he came perilously close to undermining his own campaign.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In one night, he came perilously close to undermining his own campaign.
